segments.text: why , Jerry ? Your words just came out of the blue .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: you are really happy and able to achieve high scores at school .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I work very hard and that's it , you know , practice makes perfect .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: you must have a high IQ score .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: well , Jerry , let me tell you a secret .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: my IQ score is slightly above average .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: seriously ? But you are such a genius .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: maybe I've got a higher EQ . I'm not sure .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: well , perhaps you're right . Sometimes EQ matters more than IQ .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: you can say that again , Jerry . And I'm sure you're high in both of them . With a little more time cracking the books , you can also get high marks .

segments.text: oh , thank you . I'm going to the library , are you coming ?
